title: Definitions
context: [ยง103B-1] Definitions. As used in this chapter: &ldquo;Construction&rdquo; has the same meaning as in section 103D-104. &ldquo;Contract&rdquo; means contracts for construction under chapter 103D. &ldquo;Contractor&rdquo; has the same meaning as in section 103D-104; provided that &ldquo;contractor&rdquo; includes a subcontractor where applicable. &ldquo;Procurement officer&rdquo; has the same meaning as in section 103D-104. &ldquo;Resident&rdquo; means a person who is physically present in the State at the time the person claims to have established the person&rsquo;s domicile in the State and shows the person&rsquo;s intent is to make Hawaii the person&rsquo;s primary residence. &ldquo;Shortage trade&rdquo; means a construction trade in which there is a shortage of Hawaii residents qualified to work in the trade. [L 2010, c 68, pt of ยง2]
